title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers. Same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model. Runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and prompt history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine for VS Code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) maintained by the Ollama team.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation pipeline using Ollama for local chat over your documents.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hostable Telegram bot that brings any Ollama model into group or private chats.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, built-in object mapping, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, letting you use Ollama models in production retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Feature-rich Discord bot supporting threads, slash commands, model swapping, and optional moderation.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async/await, static type safety, and nimble package distribution.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with NuGet package and full async coverage.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama generated from OpenAPI specs; supports context cancellation and retries.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST endpoints with admin UI and API key auth.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama with OpenAI-compatible chat/completions and embeddings.
